newsitem.title: USA: Fuqua sees continued favorable trends in Q4.
newsitem.headline: Fuqua sees continued favorable trends in Q4.

text.p: Fuqua Enterprises Inc said on Wednesday that its medical products and leather segments performed strongly in the 1996 third quarter, and that it expects similarly favorable results in the fourth quarter.

Lawrence Klamon, Fuqua president, said in a statement, "The results of both Fuqua's medical products operations and its leather operations continued to improve each month of the third quarter of 1996 and, based on current backlogs, this favorable trend is expected to continue into the fourth quarter."
Earlier, the firm reported third quarter 1996 income from continuing operations at $2.1 million or $.46 per share compared to $1.3 million or $.34 per share in the third quarter of 1995.
